channel.title: Exodus Loop Documentation
channel.description: Last 10 notes on Exodus Loop Documentation

item.title: Save System
item.description: Save System Exodus Loop uses JSON-based persistence with versioned schemas for forward compatibility.

item.title: Game Design Document v1.0
item.description: Exodus Loop - Game Design Document v1.0 Version: 1.3 (reflects implementation as of v0.5.30) Last Updated: 2026-01-28 Engine: Godot 4.5 (GDScript) Platforms: iOS, Android This GDD documents the actual implementation, not the original design vision.

item.title: Fleet Management System
item.description: Fleet Management System Squadron location and state management for dock/undock operations between carriers and escort duty.

item.title: Internal Systems
item.description: Internal Systems Technical documentation for internal game systems and meta-progression features.

item.title: Combat Implementation
item.description: Combat Implementation Technical documentation for the combat system implementation.

item.title: Combat System
item.description: Combat System Exodus Loop uses a Puzzle Pirates-inspired intent-based combat system with simultaneous resolution.

item.title: Architecture
item.description: Architecture Exodus Loop follows a singleton-based architecture with signal-driven communication between systems.

item.title: Factions
item.description: Factions Exodus Loop features two distinct factions, each with unique unit naming, visual styling, and combat traits.

item.title: Exodus Loop Documentation
item.description: Exodus Loop A Godot 4.5 mobile roguelike where you command a carrier fleet escaping through hostile space.

item.title: Crafting System
item.description: Crafting System The crafting system allows players to build new ship components using blueprints and resources collected during runs.
